mapper.select:
SELECT wodod.option6 as 'professionName',wodo.delivery_order_code as 'deliveryOrderCode',bs.supplier_name as 'customerName',wodo.order_date as 'orderDate', bm.material_code as 'materialCode',wodod.option7 as 'locationNum',wodod.option9 as 'deviceCode',wodod.packing_qty as 'packingQty',wodod.packing_qty as 'pickingQty', wodod.dispatch_qty as 'dispatchQty',wodod.pipeline_number as 'pipelineNumber',bm.material_desc as 'spec',bm.material_name as 'materialName', wodo.pick_material_user_name as 'pickMaterialUserName',wodo.audit_user_name as 'auditUserName',su.user_name as 'issueUserName' FROM wms_out_delivery_order_det wodod LEFT JOIN wms_out_delivery_order wodo ON wodod.delivery_order_id = wodo.delivery_order_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON wodod.material_id = bm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_supplier bs ON wodo.customer_id = bs.supplier_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON wodo.modified_user_id = su.user_id
wodo.order_type_id=8 AND wodod.packing_qty>0
and wodod.option6 like CONCAT('%',#{professionName},'%')
and wodo.delivery_order_code like CONCAT('%',#{deliveryOrderCode},'%')
and bs.supplier_name like CONCAT('%',#{customerName},'%')
and date_format(wodo.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and wodod.option7 like CONCAT('%',#{locationNum},'%')
and wodod.option9 like CONCAT('%',#{deviceCode},'%')
and wodod.packing_qty =#{packingQty}
and wodod.packing_qty =#{pickingQty}
and wodod.option9 like CONCAT('%',#{deviceCode},'%')
and wodod.dispatch_qty = #{dispatchQty}
and wodod.pipeline_number like CONCAT('%',#{pipelineNumber},'%')
and bm.material_desc like CONCAT('%',#{spec},'%')
and bm.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{materialName},'%')
and wodo.pick_material_user_name like CONCAT('%',#{pickMaterialUserName},'%')
and wodo.audit_user_name like CONCAT('%',#{auditUserName},'%')
and su.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{issueUserName},'%')
ORDER BY wodod.create_time DESC
